specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: This Solid Oak Classic Belgian Bench will make any interior come to life combining quality craftsmanship, natural beauty and timeless design. A firm and reliable shape that’s made entirely out of solid oak, one of the strongest woods, expertly handmade into a bench that's built to last. The surface of the bench top is triple sealed with a matte varnish, which makes it particularly durable. UV protection preserves the light color of the oak. This bench pairs very well with our Classic Belgian Dining Table. The bench is crafted for us by a workshop of multigenerational artisans that build furniture to last. Each item is made with love and attention, crafted from pure oak, resulting in a collection of fine furniture with a timeless feel due to it's simple forms, refined purity and versatility that have a visual impact and work very well in any interior style. This particular bench can be made to measure, where almost any size is possible. For the standard sizes, the delivery time is about 10-12 weeks, for the made to measure tables the delivery time is about 13-15 weeks. This item is crafted from solid wood. Natural changes such as slight movement, small cracks, and color variations may develop over time and should not be considered defects. These characteristics are not flaws but rather the wood’s natural response to environmental conditions. Likewise, any surface marks that may appear are a normal occurrence in solid wood. We strive to process and ship orders as quickly as possible within the estimated lead time. However, due to global shipping congestion and unforeseen delays, lead times may be longer than expected. As these circumstances are beyond our control, they do not constitute a valid reason for order cancellations. Feel free to request a delivery rate and we will do our best to search for the most reasonable quote.
